features: 【2 Way Intercom & Universal Connection】 FreedConn TCOM SC motorcycle helmet bluetooth supports 2 people real-time intercom, up to 3 people pairing. The maximum speed is 120 km/h, and the maximum intercom distance is 800 meters. Note: Bluetooth 5.0 latest version, can be paired with other old versions of TCOM VB/ SC（The pairing method of the old and new versions is different from the same version), and it can also be actively paired with other brands of helmet bluetooth headsets.)

【Clear Sound Quality & Music Sharing】FreedConn headset single pack with DSP echo cancellation, CVC noise suppression technology and Bluetooth A2DP, Hi-Fi speaker, let you enjoy clear sound and stereo music. Enjoy the riding pleasure of wireless motorbike communication systems. NOTE: You and partner can listen to the same music from one smartphone through intercom function, but only work between 2 Bluetooth 5.0 version TCOM SC/VB motorcycle bluetooth headset.

【LCD Screen & Long Standby Time 】It is an upgraded version of TCOM VB, with LCD Screen, you can easily check FM frequency, connection status and battery level, perfect for intercom beginner and FM enthusiast. The Tcom SC Motorcycle interphone supports up to 10 hours of phone talk time, 7 hours of intercom time and 300 hours of standby time, which can meet the needs of long-time riding communication.

【Audio Multitasking Technology & Hands-Free】The helmet wireless headphones allows you to listen to music, FM radio, GPS voice prompts while riding. It can realize free switching of phone calls, intercom, music and etc.. Hands-free function makes your riding more focused and safe. And it also supports voice dialing, automatically answering calls while riding, solving the pain points of highway parking (NOTE: The automatic answering call function can be turned off.).

【Simple Operation & Fits All Types of Helmets】The Freedconn Bluetooth with simple "one-button" control via wireless Bluetooth system, easy to switch various functions, like control play/pause music, reject or answer calls, even with gloves on. Comes with 2-in-1 replaceable hard microphone and Soft microphone speaker, suitable for any type of helmet. Choose hard mic Bluetooth headset for 3/4 helmet/ half helmet, and soft mic Bluetooth headset for full helmet.
description: Product Description FreedConn ┄┄ Meet all the Communication and Entertainment Needs of Your Ride FAQ: Q1: Why my speakers have no sound?/ Why only one side of speakers have sound? A1: Please make sure that you had plug in the speakers port tightly first. If it is still not working after confirmation, it is probably the speakers problem. Q2: Can the new version(Bluetooth 5.0) of TCOM SC/VB motorcycle intercom be paired with the old version (Bluetooth 3.0)? A2: The pairing method of the old and new versions is different from the same version. Please check out the video or pictures on the product page, or click on the store name: [Zongreat-UK]. Q3: What is the difference between TCOM SC and TCOM VB motorcycle bluetooth headset? A3: Their function and pairing way exactly the same, and support active pairing with other brands. The difference is that the TCOM SC moto headsets have an LCD display to check battery status, FM and headphone connection status. Q4: Why can't my TCOM VB/SC helmet bluetooth headset realize 3-person intercom? How to pair with other brands of intercoms? A4: The TCOM VB/SC helmet bluetooth kit supports 3 riders connecting at the same time, but only supports 2 riders intercom at the same time; Pls check out the video on the product page or click on the store name: [Zongreat-UK]. Q5: What helmets are compatible with？ A5: Comes with upgraded 2-in-1 soft & hard microphone, supports Full-face, Flip-up, Open-face, Motocross, Retro, 3/4 Helmet, etc. FreedConn Helmet Bluetooth Headset TCOM SC 2-Way 800M Intercom Why Choose TCOM SC Helmet Radio Communication System? T-COM SC allows 2 riders intercom and operate MP3, phone and other functions with hands off the handlebars to ensure your ride is safe. When the T-COM SC is in intercom mode, it supports up to 80km/h~100km/h and a maximum distance of 800m (2625ft). T-COM SC has an LCD screen , which provides visualization and greatly facilitates your operation. The new Bluetooth 5.0 T-COM SC supports pairing with FreedConn other Bluetooth headsets and helmets, such as TCOM VB, BM22-S motorcycle helmets, R1 Plus/R1 Pro Motorcycle helmet headset with camera, etc., you and your teammates don't even need to use the same intercom. T-COM SC can connect with some other Bluetooth intercoms of different brands (FreedConn cannot ensure 100% successful connection with other brands of intercoms. It is recommended to use the same brand of Bluetooth intercoms.). The Pairing Method of New Version 5.0 and Old Version 3.0 Features: Motorcycle intercom TCOM SC 2Pack box listing 2 x Bluetooth Receiver 2 x USB Cable 2 x Screw Driver 8 x Felted Adhesive Earphone Pads 2 x Ear Speaker & Microphone Headset 4 x Headset Clip 1 x User Manual Adapter not included (it can be charged by any phone adapter) Technical Specifications Bluetooth Version: 5.0+EDR Frequency: 2.4GHz Supports: A2DP and AVRCP Weight: 45grams (excluding accessories) Size: 81mm(L)×25mm(W)×31mm(H) Battery Type: Rechargeable Polymer 400mAh Talk Time: Up to 10 hours (Phone)/ Up to 7 hours (Intercom) Stand-by Time: 300 hours Charging Time: About 2.5 hours Notice: Any operational problems, please refer to the manual What's in the Box? (Pls make sure other intercoms have the function and confirm their pairing steps with this headset) Waterproof IP65 IP65 IP67 IP65 IP65 IP67
